14
15#ifndef RNDC_UTIL_H
16#define RNDC_UTIL_H 1
17
18/*! \file */
19
20#include <isc/lang.h>
21#include <isc/platform.h>
22
23#include <isc/formatcheck.h>
24
25#define NS_CONTROL_PORT 953
26
27#undef DO
28#define DO(name, function) \
29 do { \
30 result = function; \
31 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) \
32 fatal("%s: %s", name, isc_result_totext(result)); \
33 else \
34 notify("%s", name); \
35 } while (/*CONSTCOND*/0)
36
37ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
38
39void
40notify(const char *fmt, ...) ISC_FORMAT_PRINTF(1, 2);
41
42ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_PRE void
43fatal(const char *format, ...)
44ISC_FORMAT_PRINTF(1, 2) ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_POST;
45
46ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
47
48#endif /* RNDC_UTIL_H */
49
